keyMoments.title: 100 Million Berry Bounty Revealed
keyMoments.description: Luffy learns that his bounty has increased from 30 million to 100 million berries following the events in Arabasta, as revealed by Blackbeard.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Luffy's establishment as a major threat in the Grand Line and the World Government's recognition of his defeat of Crocodile.
keyMoments.quote: One hundred million?! When did that happen?!

bounties.reason: Defeat of Crocodile and involvement in Arabasta incident

keyMoments.title: First Bounty: 60 Million Berries
keyMoments.description: Zoro receives his first bounty of 60 million berries, the highest first bounty from the East Blue, for his defeat of Daz Bones in Arabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Zoro as a major threat to the World Government and breaks the previous East Blue first bounty record held by Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: Sixty million for me? Not bad for a start.

bounties.reason: Defeat of Daz Bones (Mr. 1) in Arabasta

reveals.information: First bounty of 60,000,000 berries - highest first bounty from East Blue

keyMoments.title: Expert Navigation Through Knock-Up Stream
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates exceptional navigation skills by calmly directing the crew to release the sails at the critical moment when the Going Merry loses contact with the Knock-Up Stream, allowing the ship to fly.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's critical role as navigator and her ability to make life-saving decisions under extreme pressure.

keyMoments.title: Disappointment Over No Bounty
keyMoments.description: Sanji asks Usopp to check if he received a bounty poster but is disappointed to learn there isn't one for him yet.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the running gag of Sanji's desire for recognition and his rivalry with Zoro over bounties.

name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Pursuit of Luffy for Bounty
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard pursues the Straw Hats to the Knock-Up Stream location, declaring his intention to capture Luffy for his 100 million berry bounty.
keyMoments.significance: First direct confrontation attempt between Blackbeard and Luffy, foreshadowing their future rivalry and conflict.
keyMoments.quote: Zehahahaha! I'm here for your 100 million berry head, Straw Hat!

keyMoments.title: Raft Destroyed by Knock-Up Stream
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates' raft is completely destroyed by the force of the Knock-Up Stream, leaving them stranded while the Straw Hats escape to the sky.
keyMoments.significance: Prevents the first major confrontation between Blackbeard and Luffy, postponing their inevitable clash.
